author: Monica Alba and Carol E. Lee and Kristen Welker and Peter Alexander
title: Coronavirus task force puts Pence — and his future — on the line
description: The vice president didn't hesitate when asked to take on the politically perilous role of leading the administration's response.
content:
WASHINGTON When President Donald Trump approached his vice president about heading up the coronavirus task force in February as criticism of the White Houses response was reaching a fever pitch, he didnt sugarcoat the assignment.
In an Oval Office meeting, T… [+8411 chars]
